title: https://docs.lfortran.org/ UI/UX Enhancements
body: I think after switch to Sphinx Material theme, https://github.com/lfortran/lfortran/tree/main/doc#documentation, a few UI changes can be enhancing: - List of title and subheadings of intrinsic function under category of intrinsic functions, say Numeric Intrinsic Functions: - Repetition on left and top; subheadings listed: - Repetition on left and right: ![Screenshot 2022-09-23 at 7 47 01 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4143778/191982934-50546820-8587-4d76-bcf9-5520275d7251.png) - Topics? : ![Screenshot 2022-09-23 at 7 47 22 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4143778/191982936-5bb3efe7-e4ed-4b42-86cf-2fcdb8826477.png) - emojis not rendering: ![Screenshot 2022-09-23 at 7 48 04 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4143778/191982941-60abec8b-0d87-45d7-a6c3-18739a943907.png) - Repetition on left and center: ![Screenshot 2022-09-23 at 7 49 56 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4143778/191982947-c6e57299-7705-4b33-a0b7-b5b0af19106f.png) - No suggestions while searching or on-the-fly search results: ![Screenshot 2022-09-23 at 7 50 19 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4143778/191982955-cf80a3a3-9204-4110-970d-e0a488d869de.png) - Empty page having headings and subheadings: ![Screenshot 2022-09-23 at 7 50 51 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4143778/191982957-b26eb0d5-659d-4c14-98a4-c9fbb04d34fb.png) Ref for lost changes: https://github.com/lfortran/lfortran/pull/146, https://github.com/lfortran/lfortran/pull/145. cc @certik.
